anime.description: The story is set in an unknown village called Greenery Forest, where is inhabited by friendly animals. The story were focused on 5 special animal friends whose friendship binds them together, http://anidb.net/ch60184 [Koori]: A brown Raccoon boy and a aspiring inventor, http://anidb.net/ch60186 [Pinpin]: A blue and white Giant Panda boy and a warm hearted artist, http://anidb.net/ch60185 [Lalla]: a pink Tabby cat girl and an aspiring musician who wishes to be a princess, http://anidb.net/ch60187 [Toto]: a purple Bat boy who wants to be a pilot and fly and lastly; http://anidb.net/ch60183 [Curucuru], a Brown bear boy who likes to cook. All of them venture through several adventures in the forest and town, making exciting and marvelous stories and also getting in (and out) of trouble.

character.name: Curucuru
character.description: Curucuru is the series`s main protagonist. A Brown bear boy who likes to cook but sometimes has tendencies to get hungry and eat anything. Despite being big, he`s very lazy, sleepy and sometimes lack courage and tenacity. He is also a very slow runner and has problems with his weight.

character.name: Koori
character.description: Koori is a brown Raccoon boy who is well known as the town`s aspiring inventor. Usually prideful, smart and always brags, his creations were a hit and miss when it comes to success. Somehow he never gives up on inventing and impressing his friends. He has a little sister and is also the oldest of the two siblings.

character.name: Lalla
character.description: Lalla is a pink Tabby cat girl and the only female member of the group, who is the village`s aspiring signer. She likes to dance and perform but also doesn`t want her private stuff to be touched. She`s very posh, likes attention and likes to be pretty, but also very kind to her friends. She lives with her mother and shown to collect various types of dolls and cute stuff.

character.name: Pinpin
character.description: Pinpin is a blue and white Giant Panda boy who likes to paint and draw, considered as the Picasso of the Greenery Forest. He likes to paint and draw, thought sometimes has a hard time finding inspiration. He is very clam and also has a kind heart to everyone, thought also gets rather scared and saddened easily. He often seeks advise to his grandfather, who lives near the lake.

character.name: Toto
character.description: Toto is a purple Bat boy who wishes to fly and also likes to become a pilot. The youngest member of the group, he is very curious, inquisitive and also very adventurous but sometimes very stubborn on things. Despite being a bat, he somehow can`t fly due to his wings.

episode.title: The Little Magician / Lalla`s Concert

Koori the Great Inventor / It`s ok, I`m right here!

Where are you Wind? / Lalla, I`m Sorry
바람아 어디 있니? / 랄라야 미안해
A Warm Snowy Day / The Moon gets Sick
따뜻한 눈 내리는 날 / 달님이 아파요
Know Know, Want to Know / Curucuru`s a Sleepyhead

내 말대로 이루어져요 / 날씬해지고 싶어요
